overview_of_class: This course is an intermediate/advanced level modern dance technique class, exploring the physical and aesthetic potential of the body in space, time, and energy. Through floor work, standing exercises, guided improvisations, and extended movement sequences, this course trains the body as an athletic, dynamic instrument with a focus on articulation of the spine, weight shifting and sharing, body connectivity, strength and release, intention and motivation, and rhythm-making. Bi-weekly journal writing and a live performance viewing supplement the physical practice.
name: Modern III
subject: DANCE
